title: What are the features of a smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: IDEAL features of smartphones: Long-Lasting BatteryPerfect CameraPerfect DisplayBest Operating System(including UI/UX)Faster Charging SpeedA Perfect body DesignA High-performance CPU/GPUAgain it totally depends on user’s need. If you are going to just use social media then buying a 70k phone will be foolish!  If I had to design my own smartphone it would be: s10+’s battery.Camera from Pixel 4/Maybe iPhone 11 ProDisplay of course from Samsung.OS, I don’t mind either iOS/Android but definitely not WindowsOnePlus’s fast-chargingBody build would be iPhone(Stainless Steel over Aluminium)And for CPU/GPU I guess will 855+/A13/Exynos 9820I thinks this phone will have a life span of at least 6–8 years! What would be your dream smartphone!
